name: Simple to do list
description:
I love to-do lists. I use them all the time in my design work to stay organised and reduce stress.

I usually use Notion to keep track of my design tasks but recently I started using this to-do list directly in Figma. It's quite convenient to have it next to a design.

Also with variants, ticking a checkbox is just two clicks away.


How to use:

Just copy and paste the empty to-do list and the components in your file and you can start use it.

To create a new item, just click Command + D (or Ctrl in Windows).
